title: France panorama. [No. 72/37]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Flashes: electronics and networks - a new system of color visualisation of networks. 2. Reptiles and sauria - snakes, crocodiles, and turtles at La Belle Epine. 3. Soulages 1970-1972 - work of the painter Soulages. 4. The summer fair - a day at the Fete des Loges. 5. Tribute to Diaghilev - commemoration of Diaghilev’s Russian ballaets in Paris.
